summary:
Adds 2 EEO followers COMPLETELY STANDALONE
Malena=woodelf
Falanu=Darkelf
descriptionHtml:
[font=Palatino Linotype][center][color=lightgreen][size=4]~ Description ~[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center][/font]

[center]This mod adds 2 Elven Followers to[size=3][color=lightblue] [font=Palatino Linotype] Falkreath's Dead man's drink inn[/font][/color][/size].
The mod uses UNP Body,so make sure to give em unp outfits,if you don't want seam issues.
[/center]

[center][font=Palatino Linotype][color=lightgreen][size=4]~ Required Files ~[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center][/font]
[center]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
And nothing else! Followrs will look like in pictures,no matter what skin texture you're using![/center]

[font=Palatino Linotype][center][color=lightgreen][size=4]~ Mods Used ~[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center][/font]

[center][font=Palatino Linotype][color=lightblue][size=3]~ ENB ~[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/font][/center]
[center]Bleak enb by trustinall :[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828][img]http://i.imgur.com/OJOuV.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][font=Palatino Linotype][color=lightblue][size=3]~ Outfit ~[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/font][/center]
[center]gloves:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7807]Blue Stripe Elite[/url]
top\belt:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21271]Bouncy Bodices UNP[/url]
trousers and earrings:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14146]Ashara's Dimonized Dress and Dragon Jewelry[/url]
boots:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7184]GraceDarkling's Ranger Armor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7818]Annika's outfit[/url]

The necklace is a custom port,and atm i don't have permission to share.[/center]

[font=Palatino Linotype][center][color=lightgreen][size=4]~ Installation ~[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center][/font]

[center]Unzip the file,and drag the meshes\txtures folders and esp folder to your skyrim data folder (C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data).
Say "Yes" when asked to merge the folders.
Activate the zzEEofollowers.esp in your skyrim launcher data files,if needed.
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/10168-1-1341317929.jpg]apachii's picture tutorial[/url]

You can either use NMM altough it's not recommended,and may cause a lot of bugs.Also if you have issues with it I won't be able to help you.[/center]

[font=Palatino Linotype][center][color=lightgreen][size=4]~ Uninstallation ~[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center][/font]

[center]De-activate the esp in skyrim launcher and remove these folders:

-skyrim/data/meshes/zzjay\UnpFollowers
-skyrim/data/textures/zzjay\Ethereal
delete the esp (zzEEOfollowers.esp) from your skyrim data folder.[/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2689072/?tb=mods&pUp=1][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EsAOIrY.png[/IMG][/url][/center]
author: zzjay
